knimeNode.name: Parquet to Spark
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a Spark DataFrame/RDD from given parquet file.

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a Spark DataFrame/RDD from given parquet file.
Notice: This feature requires at least Apache Spark 1.5.

ports.inPort: Spark compatible connection (HDFS, WebHDFS, HttpFS, S3, Blob Storage, ...)
